title: ‘It’s Terrible’: Primož Roglič Sees Tour de France Hopes Shattered After Losing 2:27 in Crash
content:
Updated: Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe captain loses over two minutes after being involved in pile-up with 10km to go. "We have different goals than fighting for podium," says team manager Aldag.
